languages.text: "Я — корабельный исповедник, Ваша Светлость. Ни одно чтущее законы Империума судно не обходится без духовного пастыря. Даже если корабль мал и не имеет на борту священника {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}, вопросы веры поручают мирянину, что твердо знает Кредо. Флагману же Вольного Торговца приличествует иметь потомственного исповедника, коим я и являюсь".

"I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."
languages.original_text: "Я — корабельный исповедник, Ваша Светлость. Ни одно чтущее законы Империума судно не обходится без духовного пастыря. Даже если корабль мал и не имеет на борту священника {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}, вопросы веры поручают мирянину, что твердо знает Кредо. Флагману же Вольного Торговца приличествует иметь потомственного исповедника, коим я и являюсь".

Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the Ecclesiarchy on board entrusts the matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am he."

languages.text: «Soy el confesor de la nave, mi{mf|lord|lady}. De acuerdo con las leyes del Imperium, ninguna nave puede recorrer el vacío sin un guía espiritual. Incluso las naves pequeñas que carecen de un miembro de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g} a bordo confían todos los asuntos de fe a un laico que se ciñe estrictamente al Credo. La nave insignia de un Comerciante Independiente, naturalmente, debe contar con un confesor que provenga de un linaje de fieles sirvientes Suyos. Tal es mi posición».
languages.original_text: "I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."

traits.locale_text: «Soy el confesor de la nave, mi{mf|lord|lady}. De acuerdo con las leyes del Imperium, ninguna nave puede recorrer el vacío sin un guía espiritual. Incluso las naves pequeñas que carecen de un miembro de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g} a bordo confían todos los asuntos de fe a un laico que se ciñe estrictamente al Credo. La nave insignia de un Comerciante Independiente, naturalmente, debe contar con un confesor que provenga de un linaje de fieles sirvientes Suyos. Tal es mi posición».

languages.text: 「私はこの船の告解者です、陛下。帝国の掟を遵守する船は、精神のガイドなしに虚空を航海することはできません。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}のメンバーが乗船していない小規模な船でさえ、信条の熱心な信徒に信仰のすべての問題を委ねます。ローグトレーダーの旗艦には、当然ながら敬虔な主に仕える家系に生まれた告解者がいることが期待されています。そして私がそのような人物なのです」
languages.original_text: "I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの船の告解者です、陛下。帝国の掟を遵守する船は、精神のガイドなしに虚空を航海することはできません。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}のメンバーが乗船していない小規模な船でさえ、信条の熱心な信徒に信仰のすべての問題を委ねます。ローグトレーダーの旗艦には、当然ながら敬虔な主に仕える家系に生まれた告解者がいることが期待されています。そして私がそのような人物なのです」

languages.text: “我是这艘船上的告解神父，大人。所有遵守帝国律法的舰船，都不能在缺少精神向导的情况下航行。即便是人手有限、没有任何{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}成员的小型舰船，也需要将所有信仰相关的问题委托给坚持信仰的教外人士处理。至于行商浪人的旗舰，像这样的舰船自然会有一位告解神父，来自帝皇忠仆的队伍。我便是这艘船上的告解神父。”
languages.original_text: "I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."

traits.locale_text: “我是这艘船上的告解神父，大人。所有遵守帝国律法的舰船，都不能在缺少精神向导的情况下航行。即便是人手有限、没有任何{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}成员的小型舰船，也需要将所有信仰相关的问题委托给坚持信仰的教外人士处理。至于行商浪人的旗舰，像这样的舰船自然会有一位告解神父，来自帝皇忠仆的队伍。我便是这艘船上的告解神父。”

languages.text: "Ich bin der Konfessor des Schiffs, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Kein Schiff, das die Gesetze des Imperiums befolgt, darf ohne spirituelle Begleitung die Leere bereisen. Selbst kleinere Schiffe ohne ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} an Bord vertrauen alle Glaubensangelegenheiten einem Laien an, der ein unerschütterlicher Anhänger des Glaubens ist. Das Flaggschiff eines Freihändlers muss natürlich einen Konfessor haben, der einer Linie Seiner ehrfürchtigen Diner entstammt. Ein solcher bin ich."
languages.original_text: "I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin der Konfessor des Schiffs, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Kein Schiff, das die Gesetze des Imperiums befolgt, darf ohne spirituelle Begleitung die Leere bereisen. Selbst kleinere Schiffe ohne ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMonistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} an Bord vertrauen alle Glaubensangelegenheiten einem Laien an, der ein unerschütterlicher Anhänger des Glaubens ist. Das Flaggschiff eines Freihändlers muss natürlich einen Konfessor haben, der einer Linie Seiner ehrfürchtigen Diner entstammt. Ein solcher bin ich."

languages.text: « Je suis le confesseur du vaisseau, Votre Seigneurie. Aucun bâtiment battant pavillon impérial ne s'aventure dans le vide sans guide spirituel à son bord. Même les plus petits navires qui n'accueillent pas de représentant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g} confient tout ce qui a trait à la foi à un profane réputé pour sa fidélité au Crédo. Naturellement, tout vaisseau amiral digne de ce nom est censé avoir un confesseur issu des rangs de Ses zélés serviteurs, et c'est précisément mon cas. »
languages.original_text: "I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le confesseur du vaisseau, Votre Seigneurie. Aucun bâtiment battant pavillon impérial ne s'aventure dans le vide sans guide spirituel à son bord. Même les plus petits navires qui n'accueillent pas de représentant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g} confient tout ce qui a trait à la foi à un profane réputé pour sa fidélité au Crédo. Naturellement, tout vaisseau amiral digne de ce nom est censé avoir un confesseur issu des rangs de Ses zélés serviteurs, et c'est précisément mon cas. »

languages.text: "Ben geminin günah çıkarıcısıyım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına riayet eden hiçbir gemi uçsuza manevi bir kılavuz olmadan yelken açamaz. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} üyesine sahip olmayan küçük boyutlu gemilerde bile inançla ilgili meseleler, İtikat konusunda yetkin bir avama teslim edilir. Bir Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisinde ise doğal olarak O'nun hürmetkâr hizmetkârlarından bir günah çıkarıcı olması beklenir. Ben öyle birisiyim."
languages.original_text: "I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. No vessel that abides by the Imperium's laws can sail the void without a spiritual guide. Even a smaller-sized ship that does not have a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} on board entrusts all matters of faith to a layperson who is a staunch adherent of the Creed. A Rogue Trader's flagship, naturally, is expected to have a confessor who comes from a line of His reverent servants. I am such a one."
